activities:
MakesBridge Technology operates an online email marketing service called the BridgeMail System.  
The company's direct collection of personal data from its website and its affiliates is limited to email address, first name, last name, job title, company, and phone number.  MakesBridge Technology uses this information for sales and marketing follow up. 
MakesBridge Technology customers have the ability to load personal data about their customers into their BridgeMail System accounts (email marketing service operated by MakesBridge Technology).  This personal information may come from the EU and may be used by them for marketing activities.
